mapper.insert: insert INTO list (LIST_ID, ID, PAID, BANK, OPERATIONS, MONEY, NAME, CATEGORY, DAY, LOCATIONX, LOCATIONY) values (seq_list.nextval,#{id},#{paid},#{bank}, #{operations},#{money}, #{name},#{category},sysdate, #{locationX},#{locationY})
mapper.select: select list_id as listId,id,paid,bank,operations,money,name,category,DAY,locationX,locationY from list where id = #{id }

select list_id as listId, id, paid, bank, operations, money, name, category, DAY, locationX, locationY from list where id = #{id } and day BETWEEN TO_DATE (#{minday }, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE (#{maxday }, 'YYYY/MM/DD') + 1
select category_id as categoryId from category where category = #{category }
select a.category_id as categoryId, a.category,b.id from category a,userscategory b where a.category_id=b.category_id and b.id = #{categoryId}
mapper.delete: delete from userscategory where category_id=#{categoryId } and id=#{id }
mapper.select: select b.category from userscategory a,category b where a.CATEGORY_ID=b.CATEGORY_ID and a.id=#{id }
select sum(money) as sum from list where id = #{id } and category = #{category }
